data.name: Elemental War - 元素大戦
data.detailed_description:
Premise


A Strategic JRPG where you choose your Kingdom, your Starting Class and depart on an unforgettable journey to fight against the evil.

Story


Four countries, each governs one element, stand off in a perfect but unstable balance. Inevitably, when insatiable thirst for power overthrows reasonings, the delicate balance trips over...
Thus, the War of the Elements starts!
Choose your side, take up your arms, and form a contract with creatures beyond the Rift, to defend your Kingdom and restore peace to the World.

Main Features

  • A Story of Twists and Turns, spanning the entire continent of Gaia.
  • Classics SRPG Experience, brings nostalgia while still feel non repetitive.
  • Innovative levelless stage design, allowing grind-free strategic battles. There's no grinding options, and every battle plays out like a game of chess - or a game of thrones.
  • Summons, a unique feature that plays a big role in combat. Utilize your summon arsenal well, for it is critical to win the battle.
  • Four Kingdoms, each has unique summons, unique abilities, and the Kingdom has attributal strength and weakness against each other, granting high replayability.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista(sp2) / 7 / 8 / 10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GT 310 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
